1.0.1.name: wordpress/easy-digital-downloads-mijireh-checkout
1.0.1.description:
Easy Digital Downloads Extension for Mijireh

Easy Digital Downloads is an open source ecommerce plugin for WordPress. Mijireh is a fully PCI compliant, secure hosted checkout page that works with a large variety of payment gateways. The Mijireh extension makes it possible to securely accept credit card payments with a wide variety of payment gateways such as Authorize.net, Stripe, eWay, SagePay, PayPal, BrainTree and others. If you need support for another gateway, just let us know.

Learn more about what it means to be PCI compliant by reading What you need to know about PCI Compliance

Why use Mijireh?

Quick Answer: Your design, use any payment gateway you want, and
